title: John Bentley (cricketer)
content:
John Bentley (1 March 1787 â€“ 26 March 1859) was an English professional cricketer.  He was the brother of Henry Bentley.

Bentley was mainly associated with Middlesex and he made 13 known appearances in first-class matches from 1807 to 1817.[1]
